member_organisations: For a list of VNMI member companies, please check the following website: http://www.vnmi.nl/index.php?page=16
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Energy, Environment, Single market, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
Emission Trading Scheme 
Circular Economy Package 
Conflict Minerals Regulation 
Energy Efficiency 
EU Trade Policy
organisation_name: Association of the Dutch Metallurgical Industry (VNMI)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Comité consultatif pour la sécurité et la santé sur le lieu de travail#X01211#VAN BEEK Robert#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1211#Alternate Member#B#Industry
membership:
Zoetermeer, The Netherlands 
Trade Association for the Dutch Technological Industry (FME-CWM) (FME is the largest organisation in the Netherlands representing employers and businesses in the technological industry. We actively protect our members’ interests nationally and internationally, provide services to individual member companies and clusters of member companies, and support 120 trade associations). 
 
Brussels, Belgium, European Union 
- Eurometaux (Eurometaux is the Brussels-based association servicing and representing the European non-ferrous metals industry); 
- European Aluminium (EAA) represents the aluminium industry in Europe. It encompasses primary aluminium producers, downstream manufacturers, producers of recycled aluminium and national aluminium associations representing the manufacturers of rolled and extruded products in 18 European countries. Other associations, that are the Organisation of European Aluminium Remelters and Refiners (OEA) and the European Aluminium Foil Association (EAFA) are also members of the EA.
relevant_communication: VNMI is active on national (NL) level and EU level regarding: circular economy, international trade (possible US trade restrictions on steel and aluminium import), climate (national Dutch Climate Agreement with Government and NGO's), CSR (national Dutch CSR Agreement with Government and NGO's).
goals__remit:
VNMI has the following goals on behalf of its member companies: 
- Health & Safety 
- Circular Economy 
- Climate (Paris Agreement)/Energy Efficiency/CO2 
- International Corporate Social Responsibility 
- Environment 
- Innovation, Research & Development  
- Trade & Employment 
- Public relations, PR & Lobby in NL and EU
